settings.title: Contact us!
settings.answer:
Shoot us an email: customerservice@hypeandvice.com

Give us a call: (213) 819-0466

*In celebration of the holidays, our team is taking a well-deserved break to be with family and loved ones. Please note that our phone support will be unavailable until January 8th. During this period, we'll be fully accessible via email (customerservice@hypeandvice.com) to assist with any inquiries or concerns.

Please understand messages are responded during working hours.

settings.title: Where's my order?
settings.answer:
Hype and ViceÂ products are made to order especially for you! Please allow up to 10 days to receive an email with a tracking number. Â If it's been more than 10 days, please note that production times can be delayed during high volume sales times. Â Don't worry! Â Your order is still in production and you WILL receive that tracking email very soon.Â 

We do this as an effort to reduce waste and offer more styles that will fit you best. Please take this into consideration when orderingÂ â™¡

Orders must be canceled within 24 hours of ordering to receive a full refund. If your order has been fulfilled we are unable to cancel it.

settings.title: How long will it take to get my order?
settings.answer:
All orders areÂ made to order in-house within 3-7 business days of your order date and then shipped via UPS/USPS. Domestic shipping times are currently within 3-7 business days. The shipping time does not account for our processing time. Production and delivery times may increase during holidays and other times of high sales volumes. Â 

Please note that once the package has left the building, we have no control over carrier delays.Â

settings.title: Can you expedite my order?
settings.answer: Unfortunately, we cannot expedite orders at this time. They are made to order especially for you and are produced in the order we receive them. They are shipped via UPS or USPS. Domestic shipping times are currently within 3-7 business days. Processing and shipping times may fluctuate during holidays and periods of high order volumes. Please note that once the package has left the warehouse, we have no control over carrier delays.

settings.title: Why isn't my tracking showing any updates?
settings.answer:
We send you a tracking number as soon as your order is shipped, but it may take 1-2 business days for the carrier to scan your order into their system and for updates to appear on their website. Please allow 2 business days for this process.

In case your order has shown progress and then stopped, please note that carrier services are currently experiencing high volumes and understaffing. Allow a few days for the tracking to update, and you'll likely see movement after that.

If there's been no movement for more than 7 days, please email us at customerservice@hypeandvice.com

settings.title: Can I cancel my order?
settings.answer: Orders must be canceled within 24 hours of ordering to receive a full refund. If your order has been fulfilled we are unable to cancel it.

settings.title: Can I change my order?
settings.answer: We can help you make changes to your order if we have not shipped it yet. If you wish to change or remove an item, please notify us within 24 hours of placing the order. Please email us at customerservice@hypeandvice.com so we can help you. If we have already shipped your order you may process an exchange or return once you receive it.

settings.title: Can I change my shipping address?
settings.answer: Please provide the accurate delivery address and delivery instructions when placing your order. Hype and Vice is not obligated to resend orders to the correct address at our expense if an incorrect address is entered. If your order has not been shipped yet, email us ASAP at customerservice@hypeandvice.com

settings.title: My order was wrong or defective
settings.answer: We apologize for any issues with your order! Please email us at customerservice@hypeandvice.com with a description of the problem and photos of the product and we would be happy to help you with a resolution.

settings.title: My order was delivered but I didn't receive it
settings.answer:
Packages can occasionally be scanned incorrectly by the carrier or experience delays, but in the majority of cases, they do show up a few days later. For this reason, we must wait for 6 business days after the delivery date before filing a claim with the carrier.

If, after this 6-day period, you still haven't received your order, please email us at customerservice@hypeandvice.com, and we'll assist you with the next steps.

settings.title: How can I process a return/exchange?
settings.answer:
Please visit ourÂ ReturnsÂ page

*Orders placed November 7th through December 28th have an extended return window until January 21st

settings.title: How do sizes run?Â
settings.answer:
Click for Size Chart

We're continuously working on improving our sizing. Our styles run true to size but if you are in between sizes, we recommend sizing up.

settings.title: How long does it take to restock an item?
settings.answer: We try to restock our best-sellers often. You can stay in the loop by signing up for notifications. Just go to the product page and select the size you need. Then, click on the "Get Notified When We Restock" button to receive an email as soon as the item is back in stock. Stay tuned to our social media (@hypeandvice) where we announce new drops and restocks

settings.title: Why is my school not on your website?Â
settings.answer: At this time we only have the licenses (school's permission) to sell and distribute for the above schools. Trust us that we are working extremely hard to get to all of the schools as fast as possible - but it's a work in process. We are launching new schools very soon ðŸ˜‰ ! But for now you can shop our Shop Hype and ViceÂ section.

settings.title: Do you do custom orders?Â
settings.answer: Yes, we do custom orders! Email us at management@hypeandvice.com for inquiries (minimum is 48 pieces per style)

settings.title: Do you guys sell wholesale?Â
settings.answer: Yes, please visit our wholesale page

settings.title: Do you do group discounts?Â
settings.answer: Yes, email us and we'll be happy to give you a discount (minimum of 30 pieces).

settings.title: How can I be featured in your website or Instagram?Â
settings.answer: We love to feature our community! Please tag us on your picturesÂ to be reposted.

settings.title: Do you have an affiliate program?
settings.answer: Yes, please visit our affiliate page

settings.title: Do you do collaborations with brands or influencers?Â
settings.answer: Yes, we love to collaborate with a brands or influencers that fit our style. Send us an email at social@hypeandvice.com

settings.title: Press inquiries?Â
settings.answer: Contact us at social@hypeandvice.com.

settings.title: Other Questions?Â
settings.answer:
Email us: customerservice@hypeandvice.com

We would love to help you with anything you need! We usually take 1 business day to respond so we appreciate your patience.Â
